photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running

Events
navigation placeholders
Exciting Events All Week Long
Button
Pallet Bar & Grill is the hub of entertainment in Fort Walton Beach, FL. We take your dining experience to a whole new level by infusing our restaurant with a vibrant array of weekly events that will keep you coming back for more. From thrilling games to live music, there's something for everyone that will keep the excitement alive the whole night.
We'd love to hear from you!
Music Bingo on Mondays
7-9 PM With Magic Music Mike
Kick off the week with a musical twist! Join us every Monday night for Music Bingo, where your music knowledge could lead you to victory. Our vibrant host, Magic Music Mike, will keep the energy high while you sing and dance the night away. Enjoy some dinner and a cocktail while you play, and you never know, you might win a prize!
Poker Night on Tuesdays & Thursdays
Free to play 6:30-10:30 PM
ï»¿
Feeling lucky? Gather your poker face and join us on Tuesday and Thursday nights for Poker Night! Whether you're a pro or a beginner, our friendly poker games offer the perfect opportunity to test your skills and enjoy the thrill of the game. Play with friends or make new ones in our game room as you compete for the top spot. Bring your A-game and get ready for an evening of excitement, camaraderie, and perhaps even a little bluffing!
Trivia Wednesdays
7-9 PM Trivia night with Magic Music Mike
Put your knowledge to the test at our Trivia Night every Wednesday! Magic Music Mike hosts a fun quiz where brainpower and quick thinking are the keys to victory. Gather your dream team and challenge your peers as you tackle intriguing questions across various categories. It's a battle of wits, laughter, and friendly competition that will keep you coming back week after week!
Live Music Weekends
6:30-10:30 PM On Fridays & Saturdays
As the weekend approaches, get ready for the ultimate party at Pallet Bar & Grill! Join us on Friday and Saturday nights for live music performances that will have you dancing the night away. Talented music bands bring an electric atmosphere to the stage, performing a diverse range of music to suit all tastes. Whether you're into rock, pop, country, or anything in between, our live music weekends promise an unforgettable time!
Learn More
Brunch Sundays
11 AM - 3 PM Bottomless Mimosas $10 & Tito's Bloody Mary $6.50
Wrap up the week in style with our renowned Sunday Brunch! Enjoy a delightful selection of brunch favorites, perfectly paired with Bottomless Mimosas. Relax with friends and family as you enjoy a day filled with good food, great company, and a laid-back atmosphere. It's the perfect way to recharge before the new week begins.
Come to Pallet Bar & Grill for an unforgettable week full of excitement, delicious food, and fantastic company!
Join Us Today!
